channel.title: No Errors on server, but i still wont load, never could understand java errors
channel.description:
When i do the compile this is what i get..
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: " 100000" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:312) at ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:39) at server.main(server.java:23)[/code]
It starts the server up and all but when i log in it loses connection and trys again and fails. Any help?
OnYx :cool:
